messages.subject: Sandra and Lynda
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, this is an indepth discussion between two of our oldest and most respected (by me anyway) listmembers, and I m still finding the interplay of ideas
messages.messageBody:
At 12:20 AM +0000 4/16/01, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> >I can't believe people are arguing about leeches and
>>how many people died from being bled.
>>.........and probably, being new, I'm out of line. But come on!
>>This is absurd. Juli
>
>Well I am not new, and I tend to agree with you Juli. I don't want
>to presume to tell people what they can and can't talk about/be
>interested/passionate about. Instead I offer a plea. Could this
>type of intense and minority involved argument be taken off list
>please?

Well, this is an indepth discussion between two of our oldest and
most respected (by me anyway) listmembers, and I'm still finding the
interplay of ideas and exchange of thinking rather fascinating, so
I'd just as soon let them continue and see where it leads, and those
who aren't interested can delete that subject thread (or skip those
posts on digest).

But if you choose to take it offlist, take me with you, okay?

Helen
